item.title: Black Friday Retrospective - A Technical View
item.description: This article was originally written by me for Eastside Co’s blog: you can find the original here “Right, what are we going to use…Sentry? Pagerduty? Have we got an account? What do you mean, we’ve not set up auto-scaling groups? OK, have we got time to create them instead of manually spinning up AMI EC2s?” Black Friday has had a very patchy impact in the UK on the high street over the last decade, but where it is undoubtedly having the most influence is in the world of ecommerce - where the territory market restrictions are removed.
